full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 755 Filed 08/10/22 Page 99 of 262 1804 LC8VMAX4 Hesse - cross 1 Q. It's a fair statement that the vast majority of the messages in these exhibits are for Mr. Epstein; correct? 2 A. Yes. 3 Q. And at the time that -- well, let me back up. 4 Many of these messages do not have dates or times on 5 them; correct? 6 A. I see a lot that do. On this page it does, yeah. 7 Q. And then there's a number that don't, right? 8 A. Yes. 9 Q. And again, you don't have any personal knowledge about the 10 accuracy of any of these messages, just that somebody wrote 11 down a message to Mr. Epstein generally in these message pads; 12 correct? 13 A. The ones I wrote are accurate. 14 Q. I understand. I'm not questioning your recording accuracy, 15 Mrs. Hesse. But all I'm talking about is the ones that you 16 didn't write. 17 A. Mm-hmm. 18 Q. OK? 19 And to my understanding, the only time you would be 20 taking messages would be when you were at the residence when 21 Mr. Epstein wasn't there? 22 A. That's correct. 23 Q. Okay. 24 MR. PAGLIUCA: If I could have a moment, your Honor. 25 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00013377
